column1: # Used to exclude specific moves from the move pool while still optionally letting them stay on their typical card
# This is used to prevent "hardcoded" moves that aren't supported from the ptcgr.randomizer ending up on the wrong cards
# or could be used to remove moves from a playthrough that are deemed too powerful or problematic
# The current default contents of this file reflect the moves that are not fully randomizable

column2: Exclude Move from Randomization (i.e. Move stays on card(s))
